KENTON & MADISON

Things to Do

While you're in town, check out some of our favorite Milwaukee places.

Restaurants

  • Lulu Cafe (Bayview) - Amazing pitas paired with coleslaw/homemade chips.
  • Benelux (Third Ward) - Good food and an extensive beer list.
  • AJ Bomber's (Downtown) - Burger joint serving shelled peanuts while you wait.
  • Vanguard (Bayview) - Bar/restaurant serving pretty good beer and a long list of fancy sausages.

Brunch Spots

  • Plaza Hotel (Yankee Hill) - Creative dishes, one of our favorite places for brunch.
  • National Cafe (Walker's Point) - Cute diner, serving both a Full English Breakfast and vegan/vegetarian treats.
  • Ma Fischer's (East Side) - Classic, no frills Milwaukee diner. Perfect for grabbing some greasy grub after a night out.
  • Holey Moley Coffee & Doughnuts (Third Ward) - Sweet treats on your way out of town.

Places to Visit

  • Milwaukee Art Museum (Downtown) - Check out the art museum's new addition.
  • Discovery World (Downtown) - Interactive science and technology museum.
  • Lakefront Brewery Tour (Brewer's Hill) - Popular Milwaukee brewery offering daily tours.

Madison Huebner 2016
